entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14 except minus 21 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14 except minus 21 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 27 February 2023
